=============================
README: Snowballz
=============================

:Author: Joey Marshall
:Contact: web@joey101.net

Description
-----------
Gasket is a simple note taking program I made for gnome. I liked the simplicity of kjots for KDE and the icons in basket (also for KDE). I combined the two into one light GTK program written in 195 lines of clean python code. It still doesn't have all the features I want such as handling hyper links, but it will!


Install
-------
This is a standard python program::

    $ sudo python setup.py install
